about_the_game:
Spooky Halloween Musically Rigging Pack is an additional content pack that contains many graphics and audio features, made especially for fans of the game!

The pack is a way to collaborate with the developer, so whoever is satisfied with the game experience and wants to contribute with the creation of new stories can purchase the pack, thus, it will help the developer, being a way to maintain the price of the game accessible and sustainable.

Accessing the pack:
After purchasing and downloading the Spooky Halloween Musically Rigging Pack, go into Spooky Halloween Properties and find the "Browse Local Files" button. This will take you to the Spooky Halloween game directory, which has the pack included in it.
After accessing the folder entitled "Spooky Halloween Musically Rigging Pack", you will be able to view all the content of the DLC!

It is recommended to view the contents of this pack only after completing the game!

After accessing the folder entitled "Spooky Halloween Musically Rigging Pack", you will be able to view all the content of the DLC!

fullgame.name: Spooky Halloween in the Voxel World (Remake)

legal_notice: The contents of this game are copyrighted and must not be redistributed or used commercially in any way.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3.4GHz) or AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3.8GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 560 Ti or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible OpenAL
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible OpenAL

  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 560 Ti or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible OpenGLR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3.4GHz) or AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3.8GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 560 Ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
